compliant.legal provisions: The use of cookies is disclosed, and users are informed about their ability to manage cookie settings.
Users have the right to access and modify their personal data.
Measures are in place to protect user data, including password protection and advice on safeguarding personal information.
Users are informed about the possibility of policy changes and are encouraged to review updates.

non_compliant.legal provisions: While there are security measures mentioned, there is no explicit mention of data breach notification procedures.
non_compliant.amend: Include a clear statement regarding the procedures for notifying users in the event of a data breach.
